*Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't ha=
d much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturd=
ay, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Inzola smiles a=
nd shakes Wrath's hand.

  "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot u=
pon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds a=
nd then looked back to Wrath.

  "So, what are we supposed to do right now?=
" Deemos asked Wrath...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveal=
llizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:=
53 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Wrath: I am Wrath and you must =
be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath exten=
ds his hand for a hand shake*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 20=
00 12:20 AM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Deemos looked at the CR C=
hamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

      "Maximal b=
ase, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

      "Who are=
 you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

      Gangon's spark is still waiting.

      A=
rtist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercis=
es him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into =
the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts p=
ass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

      "Oh, that was some blo=
w, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

      "Plintissa? Where are yo=
u my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered that=
 she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran t=
o Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

      "Plintissa dear? You=
 don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked u=
p in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. Aft=
er the kiss.

      "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa s=
aid. She kissed him.

      "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! O=
ops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy =
plain.

      Dracona held up her scanning device in front of Scorponok's f=
ace.

      "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

      "Then I'l=
l give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." =
Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and=
 Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

      The Radicons sat there still..=
.
